item.title: Same pothole you repaired last month. Poor repair standard, not surprised it's appeared again., 7th November
item.description:
Use your previous report.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 7th November
item.description:
It is outside number 18 Whittle Close, Stoke Orchard, Cheltenham, GL527SA. I have lived here for 12 months and it hasn't worked since I've been here.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29,30, Whittle Close, Stoke Orchard, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wet leaves on pavement at bus stops either side of the road make it dangerous getting off the bus. Also blocking drains causing flood issue., 7th November
item.description:
Bus stops outside 2 Long Mynd Avenue, excessive amount of leaves from the green.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Long Mynd Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
